questions: What is the main goal of this AI ?
What this AI will improve ? Who will benefit this ?
example2: It will improve users experience on a website.

questions: Who is participating during the AI creation ?
Why do you need this AI ?
example1: To comply with the regulations and detect fraud,
example2: To keep user on the platform.

questions: Can you reach the same goal without AI ? If yes, why AI is better for this problem ?
example1: Yes with humans expert, but it could be less accurate and much longer.
example2: Yes, with a simple decision tree logic deifne by human, but AI will be more accurate and so improve user experience.

questions: Which decisions will be taken with the output of this AI ?
example1: Cancel the transfer and inform the bank advisor.

questions: Who will be affected by this AI ?
How users will respond to this AI : Define questions that users may asked at the end about the AI prediction.
example1:
Why my transfer has been canceled ?
How did the AI find this prediction ?
example2: Why this movie is recommanded for me ?

questions: What is the type of AI ?
Do you need this AI to be train regularly ? How often ?
Which evaluation function will you use ? If binary classifier wieght on positive or negative ?
Using this evaluation method, do you think with time, it will affect prediction and be biased ?
Define success metrics : how will you say your AI is succeeding in what it was build for ?
Define negative metrics : how will you say your AI is failing in what it was build for ?
What are the data that you’ll need to build this AI ? (precise source type if possible and if you have it or you need to collect it)
Do you know if your data is reliable ? If no how will you say it can be reliable (see data quality section)
What feature extract from the data are important to be used for the prediction ?
